transcript: I don't get it. The first time we came here to see it, you said it was the best night of your life. And last year I remembered distinctly you said you were so excited to get here, you stubbed your toe rushing me out the door and didn't even notice until we were in the car. Let's...

segments.text: The first time we came here to see it, you said it was the best night of your life.
And last year I remembered distinctly you said you were so excited to get here,
you stubbed your toe rushing me out the door and didn't even notice until we were in the car.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I don't get it.  The first time we came here to see it you said it was the best night of your life and last year I remember distinctly you were so excited to get here.  You stubbed your toe rushing me out the door and didn't even notice until we were in the car.
